units.rationale: Describes how the vector is constructed and delivered for CRISPR perturbations.

units.title: Design of dual sgRNA construct
units.text: The dual sgRNA consists of two sgRNAs targeting the same gene, expressed (ASPM), outer RGCs (oRGCs; HOPX) and intermediate progenitor cells (IPCs; EOMES).
units.rationale: Specifies the composition and promoter arrangement of the dual guide RNA.

units.title: Flow cytometry‑based gRNA reporter assay
units.text: In this assay, a pre-assembled array of gRNA-targeting sequences fused with TagBFP is used to generate interneurons with lateral ganglionic eminence (LGE) origin (LGE-IN; MEIS2) or caudal ganglionic eminence (CGE) origin (CGE-IN; NR2F2)28.
units.rationale: Provides the experimental setup for measuring editing efficiency by fluorescence.

units.title: Construction of lentiviral plasmid library
units.text: We individually cloned sgRNA pairs and pooled them equally to construct a lentiviral plasmid library (Extended Data Fig. 3a,b). To ensure that lentiviral integration frequency was limited to one per cell, we used a low infection rate of 2.5% (ref. 18) (Extended Data Fig. 3c–e).
units.rationale: Outlines cloning, pooling, and infection conditions to achieve single‑integration per cell.

units.title: Barcoding of dual sgRNA cassettes for clonal tracking
units.text: we introduced a unique clone barcode (UCB; 1.4 × 107 combinations) for each dual sgRNA cassette to label individual lentiviral integration events (Fig. 1a and Extended Data Fig. 4a,b). Using this strategy, we obtained an average of 2,770 bulk-extracted genomic DNA from organoid pools of four different...
units.rationale: Details the use of a high‑complexity barcode to trace individual perturbations.

units.title: Induction of eCas9 in embryoid bodies
units.text: eCas9 was induced in 5-day-old embryoid bodies, followed by neural induction.
units.rationale: Specifies the timing of Cas9 activation prior to differentiation.

units.title: FACS analysis of mutant clone size
units.text: Fluorescence-activated cell sorting (FACS)-based analyses we found a mean average cell number per clone of 4.4 (Extended Data Fig. 4e,f).
units.rationale: Provides quantitative assessment of clone expansion using flow cytometry.

units.rationale: Describes deep sequencing to evaluate clonal distribution across organoids.

units.title: Annotation of cell clusters in scRNA‑seq data
units.text: We first annotated cell clusters based on control cells (non-targeting gRNA control) and eCas9-uninduced cells (35,203 cells) (Extended Data Fig. 6d–f).
units.rationale: Explains the initial step of defining cell types for downstream analysis.

units.title: Statistical testing of cell‑type abundance changes
